sql.selbeiwang: select main_problem,measure from consult_record_t where id ='{%=id%}'
sql.counselorInfor: select id,counselor_name,head_img_id,brief_introduction from counselor_info_t where removed='N' and id='{%=counselorId%}'
sql.counselorRecordListCount: select count(1) count from consult_record_t cr left join user_info_t ui on cr.user_id=ui.id where cr.removed='N' and cr.counselor_id='{%=counselorId%}'
sql.counselorRecordList: select cr.id,cr.user_id,cr.counselor_id,cr.begin_at,cr.end_at,cr.consult_time,ui.user_name from consult_record_t cr left join user_info_t ui on cr.user_id=ui.id where cr.removed='N' and cr.counselor_id='{%=counselorId%}' order by cr.begin_at desc limit {%=startLine%},{%=pagesize%}
sql.oneConsultantRecord: select cm.id,cm.create_at,cm.user_id,cm.counselor_id,cm.msg_text,cm.consult_record_id,cm.time_stamp,cm.send_people_id,cm.system_msg,ci.head_img_id from chat_msg_t cm left join counselor_info_t ci on cm.counselor_id=ci.id where cm.removed='N' and cm.consult_record_id='{%=consultRecordId%}' order by cm.create_at asc
sql.bookManageListCount: select count(1) count from (select date_format(appointment_date,'%Y-%m-%d') appointment_date,counselor_id,count(1) appointment_number from appointment_t where counselor_id='{%=counselorId%}' and removed='N' group by date_format(appointment_date,'%Y-%m-%d') ) a left join counselor_info_t ci on ci.id=a.counselor_id left join ( select date_format(create_at,'%Y-%m-%d') create_at,count(1) keep_number from consult_record_t where counselor_id='{%=counselorId%}' and removed='N' group by date_format(create_at,'%Y-%m-%d') ) b on b.create_at=a.appointment_date
sql.bookManageList: select a.appointment_date,ci.appointment_max_num,a.appointment_number,b.keep_number from (select date_format(appointment_date,'%Y-%m-%d') appointment_date,counselor_id,count(1) appointment_number from appointment_t where counselor_id='{%=counselorId%}' and removed='N' group by date_format(appointment_date,'%Y-%m-%d') ) a left join counselor_info_t ci on ci.id=a.counselor_id left join ( select date_format(create_at,'%Y-%m-%d') create_at,count(1) keep_number from consult_record_t where counselor_id='{%=counselorId%}' and removed='N' group by date_format(create_at,'%Y-%m-%d') ) b on b.create_at=a.appointment_date order by a.appointment_date desc limit {%=startLine%},{%=pagesize%}
sql.findBookInfo: select appointment_max_num,work_time_interval from counselor_info_t where id='{%=counselorId%}' , updateBookInfo:update counselor_info_t set appointment_max_num='{%=appointment_max_num%}',work_time_interval='{%=work_time_interval%}' where id='{%=counselorId%}'
sql.messageListCount: select count(1) count from message_user_t mu left join message_counselor_t mc on mc.msg_user_id=mu.id left join user_info_t u on u.id=mu.user_id where mu.counselor_id='{%=counselorId%}' and mu.removed='N'
sql.messageList: select mu.id msg_user_id,mu.user_id,mu.counselor_id,mu.create_at msg_user_create_at,mu.message_text user_message_text, mc.id msg_counselor_id,mc.create_at msg_counselor_create_at,mc.message_text counselor_message_text, u.user_name from message_user_t mu left join message_counselor_t mc on mc.msg_user_id=mu.id left join user_info_t u on u.id=mu.user_id where mu.counselor_id='{%=counselorId%}' and mu.removed='N' order by mu.create_at desc limit {%=startLine%},{%=pagesize%}
